languages.text: {n}Арбитр покладисто кивает.{/n} "Верю. Охотно верю, что вы — самое опасное, неумолимое и яростное существо на этом корабле. Буду счастлив увидеть ваш боевой триумф".
{n}Solomorne gives you a conciliatory nod.{/n} "Indeed. I believe you are the most dangerous, relentless, and ferocious creature on this ship. It will be my pleasure to see you triumph in battle."
languages.original_text: {n}Арбитр покладисто кивает.{/n} "Верю. Охотно верю, что вы — самое опасное, неумолимое и яростное существо на этом корабле. Буду счастлив увидеть ваш боевой триумф".

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne gives you a conciliatory nod.{/n} "Indeed. I believe you are the most dangerous, relentless, and ferocious creature on this ship. It will be my pleasure to see you triumph in battle."

{n}Solomorne gives you a conciliatory nod.{/n} "Indeed. I believe you are the most dangerous, relentless, and ferocious creature on this ship. It will be my pleasure to see you triumph in battle."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne hoche la tête d'un air conciliant.{/n} « En effet. Je suis sûr que vous êtes la créature la plus dangereuse, la plus implacable et la plus féroce de ce vaisseau. Ce sera pour moi un plaisir de vous voir triompher de nos ennemis. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne gives you a conciliatory nod.{/n} "Indeed. I believe you are the most dangerous, relentless, and ferocious creature on this ship. It will be my pleasure to see you triumph in battle."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne hoche la tête d'un air conciliant.{/n} « En effet. Je suis sûr que vous êtes la créature la plus dangereuse, la plus implacable et la plus féroce de ce vaisseau. Ce sera pour moi un plaisir de vous voir triompher de nos ennemis. »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは宥めるようにうなずいた。{/n}「確かに。この船で最も危険で、執念深く、そして獰猛な存在はあなたです。あなたが戦場で勝利する姿を見るのが楽しみですよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne gives you a conciliatory nod.{/n} "Indeed. I believe you are the most dangerous, relentless, and ferocious creature on this ship. It will be my pleasure to see you triumph in battle."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは宥めるようにうなずいた。{/n}「確かに。この船で最も危険で、執念深く、そして獰猛な存在はあなたです。あなたが戦場で勝利する姿を見るのが楽しみですよ」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne asiente, conciliador.{/n} «Desde luego, creo sinceramente que es el ser más peligroso, persistente y feroz de la nave. Será un placer ver cómo triunfa en combate».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne gives you a conciliatory nod.{/n} "Indeed. I believe you are the most dangerous, relentless, and ferocious creature on this ship. It will be my pleasure to see you triumph in battle."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne asiente, conciliador.{/n} «Desde luego, creo sinceramente que es el ser más peligroso, persistente y feroz de la nave. Será un placer ver cómo triunfa en combate».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙向你点点头，仿佛和解一般。{/n}“确实如此，我相信你是这艘船上最危险、最无情、最凶狠的战士，预祝你旗开得胜。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne gives you a conciliatory nod.{/n} "Indeed. I believe you are the most dangerous, relentless, and ferocious creature on this ship. It will be my pleasure to see you triumph in battle."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙向你点点头，仿佛和解一般。{/n}“确实如此，我相信你是这艘船上最危险、最无情、最凶狠的战士，预祝你旗开得胜。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne sana katıldığını belli edercesine başıyla onaylıyor.{/n} "Haklısınız. Bu gemideki en tehlikeli, amansız ve vahşi savaşçı olduğunuza eminim. Zaferinize tanık olmak, benim için büyük bir zevk olacak."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne gives you a conciliatory nod.{/n} "Indeed. I believe you are the most dangerous, relentless, and ferocious creature on this ship. It will be my pleasure to see you triumph in battle."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne sana katıldığını belli edercesine başıyla onaylıyor.{/n} "Haklısınız. Bu gemideki en tehlikeli, amansız ve vahşi savaşçı olduğunuza eminim. Galibiyetinize tanık olmak, benim için büyük bir zevk olacak."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne nickt dir versöhnlich zu.{/n} "In der Tat. Ich glaube, Ihr seid die gefährlichste, skrupelloseste und wildeste Kreatur auf diesem Schiff. Es wird mir eine Freude sein, Euch in der Schlacht triumphieren zu sehen."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne gives you a conciliatory nod.{/n} "Indeed. I believe you are the most dangerous, relentless, and ferocious creature on this ship. It will be my pleasure to see you triumph in battle."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne nickt dir versöhnlich zu.{/n} "In der Tat. Ich glaube, Ihr seid die gefährlichste, skrupelloseste und wildeste Kreatur auf diesem Schiff. Es wird mir eine Freude sein, Euch in der Schlacht triumphieren zu sehen."
